sentences.english: He laughed, and Mandy decided that the word “abode” made it funny.
sentences.chinese: 他笑了，曼迪想是“寒舍”兩個字讓他發笑了。

sentences.english: “Welcome to my humble abode, ” Cal said.
You are welcome to my humble home.
When they came to my humble abode once again, my affection towards them did not change.
sentences.chinese: 它們回到寒舍以後，我對它們的情感如故。

sentences.english: I was wondering if you'd like to come to dinner at my place this weekend evening?
sentences.chinese: 我想知道本週末您能到寒舍喫晚飯嗎？

sentences.english: First I'd like to welcome James to my humble abode here in Minneapolis .
sentences.chinese: 首先我很高興詹姆士光臨我在明尼阿波利斯的寒舍。

sentences.english: It's a pleasure to welcome you to our home.
sentences.chinese: 很高興歡迎您光臨寒舍。

sentences.english: After they returned to my humble house, I loved them as ever.
sentences.chinese: 它們回到寒舍以後，我對它們的情感如故。

sentences.english: We're happy to see you in our poor home, ' Aladdin's mother said.
sentences.chinese: 很高興在我們的寒舍見到你，”阿拉丁的母親說。

definition: dilute wine/insipid wine/I'm sorry the wine I offer you is so poor (humble)
I beg to disturb you/I trespass on your hospitality/Thank you for your hospitality!
we are honored by your presence
Your presence brings light to my humble dwelling/see also 蓬蓽生光|蓬荜生光[peng2 bi4 sheng1 guang1]
lit. your honored carriage/your highness/honored Sir (also sarcastic)/you
to do sb the honor (of attending etc)/to put in an appearance/to show up
sir (respectful form of address for an old man)
